hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select micc.cust_customer_code, micc.cust_customer_name, micc.ann_customer_code, micc.ann_customer_name, mioc.cust_ordertype_code, mioc.cust_ordertype_name, mioc.ann_ordertype_code, mioc.ann_ordertype_name from mid_customer_control micc left join mid_ordertype_control mioc on micc.cust_customer_code = mioc.cust_customer_code where 1 = 1 and micc.status = '0' and mioc.status = '0' <<and mioc.cust_ordertype_code = :externalOrderTypeCode>> <<and mioc.cust_customer_code = :externalCustomerCode>>
